Updated November     pm



Jury members are expected to hear closing arguments from attorneys for Rick Neuheisel the UW and the NCAA today in Kent PERIOD

Jury members will be asked to decide whether to award the former coach damages in his wrongful termination suit against the UW and NCAA according to the Seattle PostIntelligencer PERIOD

After five weeks of testimony that read like a whos who of former UW employees  including former President EmeritusLee Huntsman former football coach Neuheisel and a barrage of former athletic officials  attorneys from all sides of the multifaceted Neuheisel lawsuit rested their cases last week PERIOD

Neuheisel is suing the UW for the remainder of his contract  more than  million  and concurrently suing the NCAA for its part in his firing in June  PERIOD

The NCAAs testimony came to a grinding halt last Wednesday when NCAA attorneys were found to be in error for not providing Neuheisels lawyers with a correct bylaw the PI reported PERIOD superior court Judge Michael Spearman ruled he would only accept limited testimony from witnesses scheduled by the NCAA PERIOD
